attributes.action: No further or additional payments to the European Union unti the EU accounts are fully and independantly audited
attributes.additional_details: That the UK Ggovernment must not pay any further tax payer funds or additional payments to the European Union until the EU accounts are fully and independantly audited. That the independant auditors can sign off the audit of the accounts without any qualification. That the EU commissioners MUST all resign without any form of personal salary compensation if the accounts are not independantly audited and signed off before end of the financial year. It has been 20 years since auditors approved the accounts. No company would be allowed to continue trading with this record.
